projects.title: Ranked Among Us
projects.content:
After some curiosity I was granted access to the match data for Ranked Among Us. I had a broad remit to discover information and provided insights into what was happening at a much higher level than was available before.

  • Created data dashboard for presenting findings.
  • Analysed patterns of player behaviour over time.
  • Discovered cheaters after analysing game length.
  • Analysed the affects of policy changes on player activity over time.

projects.title: Ranked Among Us

image.alt: Screenshot of the Ranked Among Us home page
Screenshot of the Netlify CMS used to author content on Ranked Among Us

projects.content:
I developed 2 separate websites:

  • Static site to present corporate and blog content. Using Netlify CMS to allow end users to manage content.
  • Scoreboard website which also provided an API for a data dashboard. This site also mitigated a DDoS exploit. Migrated from PHP.

projects.title: Pidgin Nest
projects.content:
"A place we call home". Lead a rejuvenation of the Pidgin messenger project’s website collaborating with the core team and stake holder to deliver a new and refreshed website.

  • Developed plug-in list.
  • Updated theme to meet project requirements.
  • Collaborated with core developers on migrating content from multiple sources.

projects.title: Battlesnakes
projects.content:
Competing in Battlesnakes, an adverserial competitive coding competition

  • Implemented an A* snake
    In the Top 10% of snakes and competed in Fall League Gold bracket.
  • Implemnted an entropic based snake.

projects.title: Prjman
projects.content: Created a desktop application to manage code locally stored.

projects.title: Types for hosted-git-info
projects.content: Typescript typings for the npm package hosted-git-info. With +200k downloads a week.

projects.title: Todoist.js
projects.content: A JavaScript API wrapper for Todoist built while developing a custom front end.

projects.title: Remember Me Bot
projects.content: Created and deployed a super simple Twitch bot that helps viewers take notes for the streamer.

projects.title: New Tab
projects.content: A Chrome new tab extension that displays.

projects.title: Chromeminder
projects.content: Developed a Chrome extension companion to the Beeminder website that stores.

hosting.title: Automute Bot - Among Us
hosting.content: Hosting the Automute bot using Docker and Docker Compose. Contributed the current Docker configuration to utilise more features of the tool.

hosting.title: Pi Hole
hosting.content: Hosting a personal DNS server to increase network performance and block unwanted network traffic.

games.title: An Honest Adventure 2 by Daniel Jenkins
games.tech: Node, Docker, Docker Compose, Web Sockets	Source Private
games.content: Providing hosting and operations management while developing part of the server-client web socket specification.

contributions.title: GitHub Desktop
contributions.titleRight: Graphical Git client made by GitHub
contributions.content: Solved a bug where the app was resized in a certain way, closed and opened – the app would crash.

contributions.title: Clarkio Twitch Bot
contributions.titleRight: General purpose bot for a streamer
contributions.content: Refactored to remove dead code, improve readability and improve performance.

contributions.title: Chatterbox Translator Bot
contributions.titleRight: Twitch bot that translates chat messages in real time
contributions.content:
Large code refactoring and add tests:

  • Refactored code from single function blob to a modular DRY codebase.
  • Added tests to allow safer future development.
  • Added caching to reduce cost of making API calls.
